description:
Will you be a leader? A hero? An escape artist? With this collection of original Survivors, it’s easier than ever to find the perfect skillset to suit your playstyle. Explore and discover new perks and backstories from a roster of 8 unique characters.

Includes the following characters, previously released in our Chapter add-ons:

•	Jeff Johansen (from “Darkness Among Us”)
•	Jane Romero (from “Demise of the Faithful”)
•	Yui Kimura (from “Cursed Legacy”)
•	Zarina Kassir (from “Chains of Hate”)
•	Felix Richter (from “Descend Beyond”)
•	Élodie Rakoto (from “A Binding of Kin”)
•	Yun-Jin Lee (from “All-Kill”)
•	Mikaela Reid (from “Hour of the Witch”)
name: Dead by Daylight: Escape Expansion Pack
